name: imgsli Fixed Fullscreen
description: Fixes wasted space & stretches images to your full viewport size while maintaining aspect ratio.
additional_info:
If, for whatever reason, you want to view images at a smaller scale than this, simply toggle this off.

• Demo example on the home page doesn't look right with this, unless fullscreened, but normal image pages work.
• Doesn't seem to work with UltraWide comparisons.
